title: It's A Leader, it's Also a Artisan : Airwheel and its Mini Mobility Skateboards.
text: It's A Leader, it's Also a Artisan : Airwheel and its Mini Mobility Skateboards. Though it only wants to provide people with top-quality products and services, Airwheel has won its fame as the industry leader in intelligent scooter industry. Airwheel wants to be the artisan who introduces it’s artworks—intelligent self-balancing scooters, to people. USA, 18 September 2015 -- Airwheel never aims to be the industry leader. Instead, it only wants to provide consumers with top-quality products and services. Indeed, Airwheel is an artisan who makes its products the works of art which offer consumers both beauties and convenience in the city life. Airwheel A series sitting posture scooters are the newly introduced products which are innovative products even in the intelligent scooter industry. The most significant design of Airwheel A3, the first model in Airwheel A series, is the ergonomic and adjustable seat which makes the sitting-posture riding possible. The key module of the adjustable seat is the hydraulic suspension system under the seat, which is also adopted in the professional motocross. So the comfortable seat offers riders the same sitting experience as that on motorbikes. The height between the seat and the ground is 720mm, which is the most comfortable height of seats for most people. The seat of A3 is genuine leather seat which is distinguishable in looks. The designs of the seat on A3 have cost much more efforts than consumer can imagine.Besides the innovative design seat, the design styles of A3 intelligent scooters are also overturning in Airwheel family. The colour styles of Airwheel A3 are bright and sporty yet elegant at the same time. The colour style on of the shell of A3 merges matte silver, porcelain white and graceful orange. In all situations Airwheel A3 are the beautiful companions of riders. The light weight and small size of A3 make A3 the favourable vehicles for girls and female riders. Indeed, A3 are the vehicle specially designed for female riders. The ridings become both elegant and sporty at the same time. The elegant designs and innovative seat on A3 intelligent self-balancing scooters surprised people once more. With the same strong performances and adaptability of pervious Airwheel models, the A3 becomes the most comfortable model in Airwheel family. For more information of A3, please visit http://www.Airwheel.net # # #
